@@ -34,43 +33,43 @@
 
   return (
     <Router>
       <Routes>

-        <Route
-          path="/login"
-          element={
-            !isAuthenticated ? (
-              <Login setIsAuthenticated={setIsAuthenticated} />
-            ) : (
-              <Navigate to="/" replace />
-            )
-          }
-        />
-        <Route

+            element={

+          />
+          <Route

+        </CardList>
       </Routes>
     </Router>
-    </CardList>
   );
 }
 
 export default App;
